title: How to make pea and ham soup
description: Pea and ham soup is a really satisfying dinner, ready in 15 minutes, using simple ingredients you probably already have in the cupboard.Equipment and preparation: For this recipe you will need a stick blender. This meal, if served as four portions, provides 236kcal, 17g protein, 25g carbohydrate (of which 7g sugars), 6g fat (of which 2g saturates), 6g fibre and 0.9g salt per portion.
ingredients: 1 large potato (about 250g/9oz), cut into small cubes
300g/10½oz frozen petits pois or garden peas
400ml/14fl oz chicken stock, or vegetable stock if preferred
small handful fresh mint leaves, optional
salt and freshly ground black pepper
